example:
() => (
  <Popover
    content={
      <Slider label="Volume" minValue={0} maxValue={100} defaultValue={33} />
    }
    width="320px"
  >
    <Button iconRight={<Icons.ChevronDown ariaLabel="Open slider" />}>
      Volume
    </Button>
  </Popover>
)

info.title: Sliders on mobile devices
info.description: Whenever you use a slider for a mobile device, wrap it in a Popover.
